title: Monster Tracker
description: Log every can, track your stash, and see the real impact of your energy habit in one neon-lit dashboard. Monitor spending, stock levels, caffeine, sugar, hydration debt, and long-term forecasts—all stored locally in your browser.

title: Abstractify
description: Generate bold abstract art from any photo. Tweak styles and colors in real time, remix instantly, and export high-resolution results—all locally in your browser.

title: SpendScope
description: Track recurring spending and see exactly how small habits compound over days, months, and years. Explore long-term “wealth potential” and fun goals in the Reward Gallery.

title: AirTouch Gallery
description: Browse photos or explore maps with hands-free gestures using your webcam. Pinch, pan, zoom, rotate, and switch modes, all running locally for smooth, private control.

title: Open95
description: A browser-based retro OS inspired by Windows 95, complete with a working desktop, classic apps, and saved state. Includes a built-in Marketplace where every app is free.

title: Tune 3310
description: Make your own Nokia 3310-style ringtone by tapping in notes and shaping the melody. A tiny, nostalgic tool for iconic beeps and monochrome-era vibes.

title: TimeBox
description: A cinematic 3D word clock that turns the current time into a floating, glowing scene. Tweak presets, camera motion, and glow settings—or let it run as an ambient screensaver.

title: PromptVault
description: A focused place to write, store, and reuse AI prompts without clutter. Everything stays organized, searchable, and available offline with a calm, writing-first layout.

title: Sonar
description: A retro naval tactics game with Battleship energy and a CRT-glow interface. Hunt ships with sonar pings, smart AI, and punchy sound for tight, strategic rounds.

title: JobHunter
description: A private, offline job-hunt dashboard: track applications with Kanban, prep STAR stories, and tailor CVs or cover letters—securely stored on your device.

title: Sound Canvas
description: Turn audio into animated visuals you can tweak in real time. Explore styles, dial in the look, and export shareable audio art in a few clicks.

title: Split PDF
description: Split PDFs right in your browser—by page count or equal chunks—with no uploads and no fuss. Fast, private, and fully on-device.

title: MetaView
description: Preview how any URL will look on social, search, and messaging, then refine titles, descriptions, and images live. Includes quick audits and copy-ready meta tags for a clean finish.

title: LifeStats
description: Convert your age into surprisingly relatable numbers like sleep, heartbeats, and steps. More playful perspective than precision—made to make time feel tangible.

title: StreamPack
description: A self-hosted staging tool for packing shows and movies onto a USB drive with clarity and control. Auto-group episodes, build a queue fast, and track storage so nothing overflows.
